oracle.pg.rdbms

Class RDBMSIndexManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pg.text.OracleIndexManager
      • oracle.pg.rdbms.RDBMSIndexManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MesgConsts

    public class RDBMSIndexManager
extends OracleIndexManager
implements MesgConsts
    A single point for accessing all vertex and edge indices of a specific OraclePropertyGraph object.

        Verifies if the auto index contains the specified index key.
        Parameters:
        indexName - the name of the auto index.
        key - the key to validate.
        Returns:
        true if the auto index contains the specified index key, else return false.
